name: tex.vim
summary: LaTeX macros in Vim (which emulate operator-pending mode operations)
install_details:
For Vim-6.0, drop the file in the $VIMRUNTIME\ftplugin directory, where it will be sourced automatically at startup.
For previous versions, source it using the .vimrc file.

versions.release_notes:
removed a bug which was causing nested environments to be entered incorrectly. 
added a few more commands. removed some debugging statements.
added a function RunLaTeX() which runs latex on the current file or a master file 
if one exists. see the file for additional details.

added a wrapper function which makes the insert mode mappings emulate the operator pending mode. i.e, the user does not have to type the LHS fast. Even making mistakes and moving around in the file is allowed before coming back and typing the last character (in this case its chosen to be the tab) expands nicely to the RHS.
